body:
i'm thankful that my work presentation on my project was well-received and i'm happy with the other progress i'm making on my project this week. i'm thankful we decided to anthropomorphize the bot at its center as a puppy.

i'm thankful that at my psych appointment, we increased my anti-anxiety medication dosage.

i'm thankful for [this audio of a 17 year old pilot landing a plane with broken landing gear](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B229-KLudTo&app=desktop).

i'm thankful for [inbox](https://support.google.com/inbox/answer/9117840?p=transition_to_gmail&visit_id=636724359047729058-1885358786&rd=1), which is the app where i have written all of these thank you notes and whose features and UI i will miss greatly. i'm thankful, as a person who has never been into calendars and who would rather get teeth pulled than use a to-do-list app, the reminders feature, which allowed me to embed new and recurring tasks i needed to complete directly in the email inbox which is the center of my digital life, is something that has been very helpful to me.

i'm thankful for the headline "[beat the meatles](https://twitter.com/Papapishu/status/1039857463036665857)" and for [this excellent thread of beatles sex puns](https://twitter.com/EmilyGould/status/1039889881160474624) (i'm thankful to have contributed "[hey splooge / right on my ass](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/1039920567779057664)" and, this morning while taking miso out, to have thought of a potential next line, which would be "_take that bad dong / and make me wett-er_").

i'm thankful for [this list of boy suffixes](https://twitter.com/hermit_hwarang/status/1039588865005113345), especially for the cherry on top of the last one.

i'm thankful for ezra klein's podcasts, which (on his show) often feature in-depth interviews with intelligent people and (on the weeds) thoughtful discussions with journalists i respect, even though i almost always find [the opinions and arguments he personally advances to live somewhere on a scale from "washed but relatively inoffensive" to ":jerk off motion:" to "fuck right off](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/1039702551518699521)".

i'm thankful to hope that cynthia nixon wins the democratic primary for the governorship of new york.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that my work presentation on my project was well-received and i'm happy with the other progress i'm making on my project this week. i'm thankful we decided to anthropomorphize the bot at its center as a puppy.

i'm thankful that at my psych appointment, we increased my anti-anxiety medication dosage.

i'm thankful for [this audio of a 17 year old pilot landing a plane with broken landing gear](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B229-KLudTo&app=desktop).

i'm thankful for [inbox](https://support.google.com/inbox/answer/9117840?p=transition_to_gmail&visit_id=636724359047729058-1885358786&rd=1), which is the app where i have written all of these thank you notes and whose features and UI i will miss greatly. i'm thankful, as a person who has never been into calendars and who would rather get teeth pulled than use a to-do-list app, the reminders feature, which allowed me to embed new and recurring tasks i needed to complete directly in the email inbox which is the center of my digital life, is something that has been very helpful to me.

i'm thankful for the headline "[beat the meatles](https://twitter.com/Papapishu/status/1039857463036665857)" and for [this excellent thread of beatles sex puns](https://twitter.com/EmilyGould/status/1039889881160474624) (i'm thankful to have contributed "[hey splooge / right on my ass](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/1039920567779057664)" and, this morning while taking miso out, to have thought of a potential next line, which would be "_take that bad dong / and make me wett-er_").

i'm thankful for [this list of boy suffixes](https://twitter.com/hermit_hwarang/status/1039588865005113345), especially for the cherry on top of the last one.

i'm thankful for ezra klein's podcasts, which (on his show) often feature in-depth interviews with intelligent people and (on the weeds) thoughtful discussions with journalists i respect, even though i almost always find [the opinions and arguments he personally advances to live somewhere on a scale from "washed but relatively inoffensive" to ":jerk off motion:" to "fuck right off](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/1039702551518699521)".

i'm thankful to hope that cynthia nixon wins the democratic primary for the governorship of new york.
